description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共湖北省委书记、吉林省省长、中国农业银行董事长、国家开发银行行长、交通银行董事长等职。因2019冠状病毒病疫情处置不力被免职，后因严重违纪违法被调查并被开除党籍和公职。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who has served as Party Secretary of Hubei, Governor of Jilin, Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China, President of the China Development Bank, and Chairman of the Bank of Communications. He was removed from office for his poor handling of the COVID-19 pandemic and was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law, leading to his expulsion from the Party and public office.

nodes.id: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Hubei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒋超良的前任中共湖北省委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Jiang Chaoliang's predecessor as Party Secretary of Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒋超良的继任中共湖北省委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Jiang Chaoliang's successor as Party Secretary of Hubei.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖北省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒋超良担任中共湖北省委书记期间的副书记兼省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Secretary and Governor while Jiang Chaoliang was Party Secretary of Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: The current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国吉林省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jilin Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒋超良的前任吉林省省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Jiang Chaoliang's predecessor as Governor of Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒋超良的继任吉林省省长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, Jiang Chaoliang's successor as Governor of Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省岳阳市下辖的县级市，为蒋超良的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Yueyang, Hunan Province, China, and the birthplace of Jiang Chaoliang.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市的一所财经类高等院校，2000年并入湖南大学。
description.en: A higher education institution for finance and economics located in Changsha, Hunan, China, which merged into Hunan University in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省长沙市的综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Changsha, Hunan, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国四川省成都市的财经类高等院校。
description.en: A higher education institution for finance and economics located in Chengdu, Sichuan, China.

zh-cn: 中国农业银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国有大型商业银行之一。
description.en: One of the large state-owned commercial banks in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国金融界人物，曾任中国人民银行行长，在蒋超良的早期职业生涯中对其有提携作用。
description.en: A figure in China's financial sector, former Governor of the People's Bank of China, who played a mentoring role in Jiang Chaoliang's early career.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1997年爆发的一场世界性金融危机，蒋超良曾参与处置其在中国广东地区引发的问题金融机构风险。
description.en: A global financial crisis that erupted in 1997. Jiang Chaoliang was involved in handling the risks of troubled financial institutions it caused in Guangdong, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒋超良曾在广东处置金融风险时协助过他。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, whom Jiang Chaoliang assisted in handling financial risks in Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Hubei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国有大型商业银行之一。
description.en: One of the large state-owned commercial banks in the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 国家开发银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的开发性金融机构。
description.en: A development finance institution in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国金融界人物，蒋超良的前任中国农业银行董事长。
description.en: A figure in China's financial sector, Jiang Chaoliang's predecessor as Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 2019年末起爆发的全球大流行病。蒋超良因在疫情初期主政湖北时防疫不力而遭到批评并被免职。
description.en: A global pandemic that began in late 2019. Jiang Chaoliang was criticized and removed from office for his ineffective handling of the epidemic during its initial outbreak while he was in charge of Hubei.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 14th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关和中华人民共和国的最高监察机关。
description.en: The highest disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China and the highest supervisory body of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1978年考入湖南财经学院。
description.en: Enrolled in Hunan College of Finance and Economics in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，湖南财经学院并入湖南大学。
description.en: In 2000, Hunan College of Finance and Economics merged into Hunan University.

degree.zh-cn: 货币银行学专业在职研究生

description.zh-cn: 于2025年10月27日因严重违纪违法被开除党籍。
description.en: Was expelled from the Party on October 27, 2025, for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 在农行工作期间受到时任副行长戴相龙的赏识，后在戴相龙出任央行行长后，蒋超良也调入央行并成为其助手。
description.en: He was appreciated by then-Vice President Dai Xianglong while working at the Agricultural Bank. After Dai became the Governor of the People's Bank of China, Jiang was also transferred to the central bank and became his assistant.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲金融危机爆发后，蒋超良被派往人民银行深圳和广州分行担任行长，负责处置问题金融机构风险，这段经历成为其职业生涯中的重要一笔。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Asian financial crisis, Jiang Chaoliang was sent to serve as the head of the Shenzhen and Guangzhou branches of the People's Bank of China to handle the risks of troubled financial institutions, which became a significant part of his career.

description.zh-cn: 在广东处置亚洲金融危机后的问题金融机构风险时，协助时任中共广东省委常委、副省长王岐山。
description.en: While handling the risks of troubled financial institutions in Guangdong after the Asian financial crisis, he assisted Wang Qishan, who was then a member of the Standing Committee of the Guangdong Provincial Party Committee and Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 蒋超良接替项俊波，担任中国农业银行董事长。
description.en: Jiang Chaoliang succeeded Xiang Junbo as Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2014年9月至10月任代省长，2014年10月起正式担任省长。
description.en: Served as Acting Governor from September to October 2014, and officially became Governor in October 2014.

description.zh-cn: 蒋超良担任吉林省省长期间，巴音朝鲁为省委书记。
description.en: While Jiang Chaoliang served as Governor of Jilin, Bayanqolu was the Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 蒋超良接替巴音朝鲁担任吉林省代省长职务。
description.en: Jiang Chaoliang succeeded Bayanqolu as the acting Governor of Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘国中接替蒋超良担任吉林省省长职务。
description.en: Liu Guozhong succeeded Jiang Chaoliang as the Governor of Jilin Province.

relationships.target: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 蒋超良接替李鸿忠担任中共湖北省委书记职务。
description.en: Jiang Chaoliang succeeded Li Hongzhong as the Party Secretary of Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 应勇接替蒋超良担任中共湖北省委书记职务。
description.en: Ying Yong succeeded Jiang Chaoliang as the Party Secretary of Hubei.

relationships.target: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 蒋超良担任中共湖北省委书记期间，王晓东为副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Jiang Chaoliang served as Party Secretary of Hubei, Wang Xiaodong was the Deputy Secretary and Governor.

description.zh-cn: 作为地方党委负责人，蒋超良向以习近平为核心的党中央负责。
description.en: As the head of a local party committee, Jiang Chaoliang was responsible to the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping at its core.

description.zh-cn: 因在疫情初期防疫不力等问题，蒋超良被免去中共湖北省委书记职务。
description.en: Due to issues including ineffective epidemic prevention in the early stages of the outbreak, Jiang Chaoliang was removed from his position as Party Secretary of Hubei.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会农业与农村委员会
第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌严重违纪违法，接受中央纪委国家监委的纪律审查和监察调查，并最终于2025年10月27日被开除党籍和公职。
description.en: He was subjected to disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission for suspected serious violations of discipline and law, and was ultimately expelled from the Party and public office on October 27, 2025.
